== Irinjalakuda (M) (803282) ==

Irinjalakuda (M) is a town in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 11.24 sq. km. and harbouring 7461 households with total population of 28741 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 22 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 290 km. Male population is 13425 and female population is 15316. Scheduled Caste population is 2834 and Scheduled Tribes population is 46. Census Location Code of the town is 803282<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 22 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 68 km. Railway station is at Irinjalakuda at a distance of 8 km.
